reviews_data.review_text: (由 Google 提供翻譯) 很棒的地方，有很棒的咖啡和超級友好的員工和所有權！院子里外都有很多空間供學習、工作或閒逛。如果您有機會詢問，隔壁提供咖啡的 Haervest 咖啡烘焙機是一個非常酷的地方！  哦，當你在那裡的時候嚐嚐酵母華夫餅！！ 🧇😍  (原始評論) Wonderful spot with great coffee and super friendly staff and ownership! Lots of space inside and outside in the courtyard for studying, work, or hanging out. Haervest Coffee roasters next door that supplies the coffee is a really cool spot if you get a chance to ask about it!  Oh, and try the sourdough waffle while you're there!! 🧇😍

(由 Google 提供翻譯) 我丈夫和我喜歡背景！我喜歡拿鐵咖啡，他是冷萃咖啡的超級粉絲。我們吃過的所有食物都很棒，尤其是酵母華夫餅和鱷梨吐司。氣氛很棒，工作人員非常友好。偉大的除了我們的鄰居！  (原始評論) My husband and I love backdrop! I love the lattes and he's a huge fan of the cold brew. All the food we've had has been fantastic, especially the sourdough waffle and avocado toast. The atmosphere is great and the staff is so friendly. Great addition to our neighborhood!!

(由 Google 提供翻譯) 驚人的空間和美味的咖啡和食物！我喜歡杏仁黃油吐司，到目前為止我最喜歡的飲料是冰鎮肉桂和蜂蜜拿鐵！在這裡總是很棒的體驗。 🤍  (原始評論) Amazing space and delicious coffee and food! I enjoy the almond butter toast and my favorite drink so far is the iced cinnamon and honey latte! Always a great experience here. 🤍
